title: Vincent Kompany: Who is Bayern’s new coach?
snippet: The central defender would then have spells at Hamburg and Manchester City before one final stint back at his boyhood club, which was also his first job as a coach. The 38-year-old was most recently in charge of English side Burnley. Kompany won 89 caps at senior level for Belgium, competing at two World Cups (2014 and 2018), as well as the 2008 Olympic Games in Beijing. Find out more about Bayern’s new Belgian boss here. Vincent Jean Mpoy Kompany first joined Anderlecht’s academy in 1992 before making his senior debut at the age of 17 in 2003.
